original_title: From the Files of Joseph Wambaugh: A Jury of One
overview: In the first of a potential series of films inspired by the real-life experiences of Los Angeles police officer turned bestselling author Joseph Wambaugh, an on-the-skids detective, with memories of having accidentally shot and killed his partner while they were pursuing a pair of bank robbers, tries to put his life back in order.
title: From the Files of Joseph Wambaugh: A Jury of One
